sentence.Network_en: Shortly afterward, in mid May, an even greater blow.
sentence.Network_cn: 不久之后, 五月中旬, 一场更大的灾难降临了.

sentence.Network_en: They had been in the division lead since mid - May.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们自从五月中就一直占据王位.

sentence.Network_en: Li , you have my word, mid - May!
